items.title: ICICI Bank impresses brokerages with steady Q2, sparks wave of 'buy' calls, target upgrades
items.description: Analysts foresee up to 28 percent upside from current levels, as the bank's steady results reinforced its leadership among private sector peers

items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger shares in focus on signing MoU with Rajasthan govt
items.description: KRN Heat Exchanger and Refrigeration Share Price | The said MoU is for the proposed investment to the tune of Rs 1,000 crore over a period of time in various trenches.

items.title: BPCL shares in focus on JV agreement with Oil India for city gas distribution
items.description: Bharat Petroleum Corporation Share Price | Both the companies will hold 50-50 percent in the JV company.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US markets mixed, Asian gains
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: The Nasdaq ended higher on Friday, driven by megacap shares, as investors awaited quarterly results from some of Wall Street's biggest companies next week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 259.96 points, or 0.61%, to 42,114.40, the S&P 500 lost 1.74 points, or 0.03%, to 5,808.12 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 103.12 points, or 0.56%, to 18,518.61.

items.title: First Tick: Top 10 global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a muted start for the day.

items.title: Short Call | SME IPOs double returns while giants stumble; Nuvoco Vistas, Colgate in focus
items.description: I don’t think the objective of investment should ever be to take a risk in order to get a return. I think the objective of shrewd investment should be to find opportunities which offer a larger return than the average, combined with adequate safety - Benjamin Graham

items.title: Agri Picks Report October 28, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, Farmers in Maharashtra have sown rabi crops over 192,938 hectares as of Tuesday, down 41.5% from 329,971 hectares sown in the corresponding period last year, according to a report released by the state government's agriculture department.

items.title: YES Bank soars 10% as profit jumps over two-fold YoY in Q2FY25
items.description: YES Bank's net interest income (NII) also registered solid growth, rising 14.3 percent YoY in Q2FY25

items.title: IndiGo stock nosedives 12% after Q2 net loss; brokerage remain bullish
items.description: Shares of IndiGo plummeted after reporting a net loss of Rs 987 crore for Q2 FY25, with brokerages maintaining bullish outlooks amid healthy demand and international expansion efforts.

items.title: Deepak Builders & Engineers shares list at 1.5% discount over IPO price
items.description: Deepak Builders & Engineers IPO: Despite weak sentiment, the issue was subscribed over 41 times.

items.title: Waaree Energies shares list at 66% premium over IPO price on NSE
items.description: Waaree Energies IPO: The Rs 4,321-crore IPO witnessed strong demand with the offer being oversubscribed 76.34 times.

items.title: Cash market turnover dips to 7-month low, marking sharpest decline since March
items.description: The combined average daily turnover for BSE and NSE in the cash market has fallen to a seven-month low of Rs 1.15 lakh crore in October till date, down 12.5% from a month ago

items.title: Godrej Consumer Q2: Steady numbers amid cost headwinds
items.description: Focus on profitability, innovation, and business simplification to continue

items.title: Is the tide turning against Indian equities?
items.description: Investors should have a bias in favour of large-caps while buying the dips. It merits paying heed to the fundamentals of companies and growth outlook before jumping to buy the correction in the broader markets.

items.title: Shriram Finance jumps 7% on healthy Q2, brokerages share 'buy' calls, see up to 22% upside
items.description: Multiple 'buy' calls were issued as analysts expressed confidence on the company's steady performance, attractive valuations, and positive guidance for FY25

items.title: Metro Brands: Eyeing strong growth in H2 FY25
items.description: The upcoming wedding and festive seasons as well as a low base in the corresponding period last year should aid performance

items.title: Diwali 2024: Tepid returns, higher volatility expected as multiple concerns loom this Samvat 2081
items.description: Analysts warn that the mid-and small-cap segments, which have rallied significantly over the past 12 to 18 months, could face sharper declines if earnings fail to meet expectations.

items.title: Chart of the day | Unpacking the reasons behind India's funds outflow
items.description: While there is speculation that funds are moving from India to China, the data don't support this hypothesis.

items.title: Investing for Samvat 2081 with Manish Chokani: Last year was heavenly, this year has external risks
items.description: In this Diwali special, Manish Chokhani, Director of Enam Holdings, discusses if small-and-mid cap space will see a resurgence, why disinvestment has been a disappointment and what India will need to do to attract FII funds.

items.title: DLF stock zooms 6% as Q2 net profit more than doubles; brokerages bullish
items.description: DLF shares saw a notable increase, driven by a remarkable 121 percent year-on-year growth in consolidated net profit, reaching Rs 1,387 crore for Q2FY25.

items.title: Can ICICI Bank’s valuation re-rate further?
items.description: The bank posted an all-round show at a time when the banking sector is struggling

items.title: Bank of Baroda stock soars 6% on solid Q2 earnings show, strong asset quality
items.description: Looking ahead, Bank of Baroda's management anticipates deposit growth of 9-11 percent for FY25, a slight reduction from the earlier guidance of 10-11 percent.

items.title: Praj Industries shares drop 5% after Q2 earnings show disappoints
items.description: Along with a fall in revenue and net profit, Praj Industries' order intake also slowed down from last fiscal. though it improved on a sequential basis.

items.title: Bandhan Bank surges 9% on healthy Q2 performance, brokerages retain bullish stance
items.description: Brokerages were impressed by the results and retained their 'buy' calls, seeing up to 36 percent upside potential.

items.title: Texmaco Rail shares soar 6% as Q2 net profit nearly triples YoY, margins increase
items.description: Texmaco Rail stock has risen around 18 percent so far this year, outperforming Nifty's returns of 12 percent. In the past 12 months, the counter has gained 68 percent.

items.title: Quality comes at a cost: ASK Investment Managers struggles as investors seek higher returns elsewhere
items.description: Distributors are of the view that while Bharat Shah, the whole-time director of ASK Capital Managers, has long been known for his commitment to quality stocks, this focus has led to underperformance in various strategies of ASK Capital Managers, making clients re-think their loyalty.

items.title: Taking Stock: Market bounces back; Nifty above 24,300, Sensex up 603 points
items.description: All sectoral indices ended in the green with PSU Bank index rising 3.8 percent, Metal index adding 2.5 percent, while pharma, media, realty rose more than 1 percent each.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Stocks that moved the most on October 28
items.description: The market rebounded after a week of continuous sell-offs, bolstered by positive earnings reports from banks and a decline in oil prices amid expectations of reduced retaliatory actions in the Middle East, which boosted investor sentiment.

items.title: Live: Nifty Kicks Off Diwali Week With Triple-Digit Rally|Bandhan Bank, IndiGo In Focus|Closing Bell
items.description: Stocks snap a five-day losing streak. Nifty kicks off Diwali week with sparkling gains. Bargain hunting in mid & smallcaps. NSE advance-decline ratio at 5:2. Buying in financials, metals & realty shares. Nifty PSU bank top sectoral gainer. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar

items.title: India fares better than EM peers in attracting FII funds this year despite high valuations
items.description: India draws positive FII inflows in 2024, standing out amid outflows from other emerging markets as economic stability and growth potential boost its appeal.
